response.original_title: Celluloid Fury - Essential Kung Fu Trailers
response.overview: A collection of kung fu trailers: Trailers:  RON NECK LI ALONG COME A TIGER NINJA DESTROYER THE KUNG FU MONK THE WAYS OF KUNG FU TEN TIGERS OF SHAOLIN ROTARY KICKS THE EAGLE'S KILLER MANTIS BOXER DEADLY SHAOLIN REVENGER TRACKING THE DRAGON JUDO vs KARATE BOOTED BABES, BUSTED BOSS EIGHTEEN BRONZEMEN II REVENGE OF THE SHAOLIN MASTER ONE FOOT CRANE THE DRAGON, THE LIZARD THE BOXER JUDO FOR LIFE 18 SWIRLING RIDERS DUMB BOXER WATCH OUT CRIMSON BAT! HEROES DAZZLING YOUNG HERO YOUNG HERO DOUBLE DOUBLE CROSSER THE INVISIBLE TERRORIST SHAOLIN INVINCIBLE GUYS KARATE TIGER CRUSH BIG BOSS II TRIUMPH BY TWO KUNG FU ARTS AMSTERDAM CONNECTION THE GODFATHER'S KUNG FU FAMILY BRUCE AND SHAOLIN KUNG FU Part II DRUNKEN MASTER DOLLAR FIST EAGLE'S CLAW RETURN OF THE CHINESE KUNG FU WANDERER INVINCIBLE ARMOUR THE HOT THE COOL AND THE VICIOUS
response.title: Celluloid Fury - Essential Kung Fu Trailers
